column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " That wolf sounds so sad . "
#Text=Sokka says : " It 's probably wounded . "
#Text=Bato says : " No , it 's been separated from the pack .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We need to go back .
#Text=I wan na see Dad , but , helping Aang is where we 're needed the most .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're right .
#Text=" Bato says : " Your father will understand , and I know he 's proud of you .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Thanks , Bato .
#Text=" Bato says : " I know where to go from here .
#Text=Take this in case you want to find us .
#Text=I 'll leave a message at the rendezvous point .
#Text=" Aang says : " Looks like we 're going alone , guys .
#Text=" Mother Superior says : " Avatar , you must leave !
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay , I get it .
#Text=Everybody wants me gone .
#Text=" Mother Superior says : " A group of people came to the abbey looking for you .
#Text=" Aang says : " Who ?
#Text=" Mother Superior says : " A fierce looking woman with a horrible monster , and a young man with a scar .
#Text=" Aang says : " Zuko .
#Text=" Mother Superior says : " The beast was using the scent of a necklace to follow you .
#Text=" Aang says : " A necklace ?
#Text=Katara !
#Text="
